title: Title VIII - Lease
coverage: General Provisions, Rural and Urban Lease

required_clauses.name: payment_schedule
required_clauses.description: When and how rent is paid

required_clauses.name: utilities
required_clauses.requirement: Specify responsibility for electricity, water, etc.

required_clauses.name: repairs
required_clauses.requirement: Lessor makes necessary repairs; lessee responsible for minor
required_clauses.default: Lessor: major repairs; Lessee: minor repairs

lease_duration.description: No lease exceeding 99 years is valid

rental_amount.description: Rent must be specified (free use is commodatum, not lease)

security_deposit.description: Typical maximum is 3 months (1 month deposit + 2 months advance)

lessor_obligations.obligation: Deliver the property fit for intended use
Make necessary repairs to maintain property for intended use
Answer for warranty against hidden defects

lessee_obligations.obligation: Pay the rent at agreed time and place
Use the property as a diligent father of a family
Pay for expenses of the deed of lease
Inform lessor of urgent repairs needed

termination_grounds.description: Lease ends automatically on fixed date

termination_grounds.ground: Imminent danger to life or health

no_fixed_term.description: For leases without fixed term, notice depends on payment frequency

fixed_term.description: Fixed-term lease ends on specified date without need for demand

sublease.rule: Lessee may sublet unless expressly prohibited
sublease.description: Sublease allowed if no prohibition in contract

assignment.rule: Cannot assign without lessor consent unless stipulated

implied_new_lease.rule: Continued possession 15 days with lessor acquiescence = new lease

suspension_of_rent.rule: Lessee may suspend rent if lessor fails to make necessary repairs
suspension_of_rent.description: Right to withhold rent for material breach

dangerous_condition.rule: Lessee may immediately terminate if property poses danger
dangerous_condition.description: Imminent danger to life/health allows immediate exit

consumable_goods.rule: Cannot lease consumable goods except for exhibition or accessories
consumable_goods.description: Lease is for use, not consumption

notice_period_check.description: If no fixed term, ensure proper notice periods

default_terms.payment_location: At lessor's residence or place of business
default_terms.repairs: Lessor: necessary repairs; Lessee: minor maintenance
